name: Merri Puzzle
description: Merri Puzzle is a physics based puzzle solving game, with a unique look and feel to it. The goal is simple, getting an object, often a ball to the end of a maze.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista, Windows 7, Windows 8, Windows 10 Processor: 1GHZ or higher Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: 512mb GFX Memory Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, Windows 10 Processor: 1GHZ or higher Graphics: 1gb GFX Memory or higher Storage: 2 GB available space
